command: curl -fsS --retry 2 --connect-timeout 5 --max-time 20 --compressed -X POST -H "Authorization: Bearer $FULLCONTACT_KEY" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Accept: application/json" "https://api.fullcontact.com/v3/company.enrich" --data '{"domain":"example.com"}' -o fullcontact_company_example.com.json -w '{"service":"fullcontact_company","http_code":%{http_code},"url":"%{url_effective}"}\n' >> recon_t1597.log
explanation: Uses FullContact's paid enrichment API to retrieve company data for a domain via authenticated POST, capturing structured JSON and logging status.
rationale_steps: Select a paid, reputable proprietary source (FullContact).
Authenticate using bearer token sourced from environment variables.
Post a minimal JSON body to constrain the query (reduce noise).
Persist returned JSON to disk for later analysis.
Log HTTP code and effective URL to track success/failures.
